alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 27 at 9:51PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Rain has transitioned over to snow... Across portions of northern and central NV (including many locations between I80 and Highway 50), snow levels have lowered to around 4500 feet, which has resulted in rain changing to snow. While snow amounts are for the most part less than an inch so far, many roadways have become slick. Motorists should remain alert to rapidly changing weather and road conditions, and reduce speeds over snow covered roadways. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
